content.question: While the ndop is relatively naturalistic, the artist visibly altered the figure’s anatomical proportions to emphasize the king’s

choices.label: closed eyes, which suggest inner wisdom and spiritual connection
small ears and mouth, which affirm his promise neither to speak nor listen to gossip
large head, which was considered the seat of intelligence and wisdom
muscular torso, which demonstrated his physical strength and power

content.answer: large head, which was considered the seat of intelligence and wisdom

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
